tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE water_usage_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    department_name STRING,
    water_consumption DECIMAL,
    report_month DATE
)

CREATE TABLE water_meter (
  meter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meter_reading INT NOT NULL,
  employee_id INT,
  reading_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employee(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE report (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_month INT NOT NULL,
  report_year INT NOT NULL,
  department_id INT,
  meter_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (department_id) REFERENCES department(department_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES water_meter(meter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE water_usage (
  usage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  meter_id UUID,
  month INTEGER,
  year INTEGER,
  usage_in_gallons INTEGER,
  FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES water_meter(meter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE monthly_report (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  department_id UUID,
  month INTEGER,
  year INTEGER,
  total_usage_in_gallons INTEGER,
  FOREIGN KEY (department_id) REFERENCES department(department_id)
);
